text: krUqrami#vaq vA a#syA Eqtat ka#rOtiq yat Kana#tyaqpa upa# sRujaqtyApOq vai SAqntAH SAqntABi#rEqvA&syaiq Suca(gm)# Samayatiq saM tE# vAqyurmA#taqriSvA# dadhAqtvityA#ha prAqNO vai vAqyuH prAqNEnaiqvAsyai$ prAqNa(gm) saM da#dhAtiq saM tE# vAqyurityA#haq tasmA$d-vAqyupra#cyutA diqvO vRuShTi#rIrtEq tasmai# ca dEviq vaSha#Dastuq - [  ] 21
